main.name: Bhavya Goyal
main.bio: I'm a junior at IIIT-K pursuing my BTech in Computer Science Engineering with a passion for competitive programming. Currently a Full-Stack web and app developer. Eager to meet new people and acquire new skills.

projects.title: BigSy
projects.dis: A unified form of database software that can search text within any format of data/file such as jpeg, png, pdf, word, SQL,JSON, CSV, audio files. Build for Madhya Pradesh State Police under PS AT980. Elastic search was used to quickly query large amounts of data, taking about 200ms(approx 16 million documents).

projects.title: Partners in crime
projects.dis: Platform build to connect students belonging to same college to Particate in Hackathons hosted on various web sites. In-app chat support, List of all hackathons posted on various platforms like MLH DEV-POST and DEVFOLIO in one place, Broad and Efficient Search Algorithm.

projects.title: Valentina
projects.dis: Sociallizing App build for IIIT Kottayam students build using React Native(EXPO) and firebase with End-to-End encryted chat feature.

projects.title: UPSIDA
projects.dis: A website developed during a Hackathon hosted by Uttar Pradesh government.

projects.title: GFG Webhacks
projects.dis: A frontend developed during a Hackathon hosted by Geeks for Geeks.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.dis: Tic-Tac-Toe game build using the undefeatable MinMax algo.

projects.title: Url Shortner
projects.dis: url shorter build using python-django web framework.
